data.name: RPG Maker VX Ace - Epic Strings
data.detailed_description:
Please note: The contents of this pack are identical to RPG Maker MV version of Epic Strings.

From mournful cello to intense violin and mysterious harp, there's something about string instruments that gives them a truly special sound.

Composed by Murray Atkinson, Epic Strings is a set of 14 music themes (and one bonus theme remastering) that covers a variety of orchestral themes. From mysterious dragons to adrenaline-inducing battles, this pack is a must have for every music enthusiast!

This pack contains:
  • 14 unique music themes.
  • Music for battle, horror, exploration and more
  • .m4a, .wav, .ogg, and .mp3 formats included.
  • Royalty free music to use in your commercial and non-commercial RPG Maker projects.

data.supported_languages: English, French, German, Spanish, Italian, Portuguese-Brazil, Japanese

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS:Microsoft® Windows® XP / Vista / 7 (32-bit/64-bit)
  • Processor:Intel® Pentium® 4 2.0 GHz equivalent or faster processor
  • Memory:512 MB RAM
  • Graphics:1024 x 768 pixels or higher desktop resolution
  • Hard Drive:400 MB HD space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Processor:Intel® Pentium® 4 2.0 GHz equivalent or faster processor
  • Memory:512 MB RAM
